/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop for the urban landscape below.

On either side of the street, buildings rise up, their facades adorned with various advertisements and signs. Among them, a large billboard stands out on the left side of the street, while a smaller one catches the eye on the right side. 

The street itself is lined with trees, their green leaves adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. Power lines crisscross above, forming a network that powers the city. 

In the distance, a construction site can be seen, hinting at the ongoing development and progress in the city. The image is a snapshot of life in Beijing, capturing the blend of nature, architecture, and human activity that characterizes the city.
